Class Shop

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shop

  • public class Shop
extends java.lang.Object
    The Shop is the main backend controller for the entire shop. It contains access to the Inventory and SupplierList "databases".
    Since:
    Feb. 12, 2020
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    P. Link

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Inventory inventory
      The Inventory, which holds all the items.
      private SupplierList supplierList
      The Supplier List, which keeps track of all shop Suppliers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shop(Inventory inventory, SupplierList supplierList)
      The constructor for the Shop, which loads in an Inventory and a SupplierList, based on data from files (for example).

    • Field Detail

      • inventory

        private Inventory inventory
        The Inventory, which holds all the items.

      • supplierList

        private SupplierList supplierList
        The Supplier List, which keeps track of all shop Suppliers. It is unused because it does not need to be used, as each item references its supplier directly.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shop

        public Shop(Inventory inventory,
            SupplierList supplierList)
        The constructor for the Shop, which loads in an Inventory and a SupplierList, based on data from files (for example).
        Parameters:
        inventory - The inventory to set for the shop
        supplierList - The supplier list to set for the shop

        public java.lang.String listAllItems()
